content: Buzz Aldrin and every other astronaut that supposedly walked in the moon anytime someone heckles them or says no you didn't they want to fight that's the move of someone who is a liar and doesn't want their dirty laundry aired

More of the people that worked on the Apollo 11 fake moon-landing are coming forward former CIA people people that work with Stanley Kubrick on the film and it's truly enlightening no man has ever been to the Moon it was all a ruse. And humans so gullible Generations bought it

Human beings are so gullible you could tell them anything and they'll believe it and anybody that tries to tell them different they want to fight about it, it's just ridiculous we all need to come to grips with the facts that 911 was an inside job and we never walked on the moon.
